main.name: Diana González Santillán
main.description: Computer Scientist, Web Developer, and Technical Account Manager, among other things
main.bio: I was born and raised in Mexico City, where I am currently located. My favorite things to do are solving puzzles, discovering new music, learning new skills, taking care of my plants, riding my bike, spending time with my loved ones, and traveling. Throughout my career, I have lived in Mexico City, California Bay Area, and Guanajuato, and obtained several degrees and certifications, including the I.B. diploma from La Escuela de Lancaster; a B.S. in Computer Science (and a minor in Math) from the University of California, Santa Cruz; a certification in Deep Learning from CIMAT; and a Masters in Computer Science from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. I also have 5+ years of experience in technical, customer-facing roles including Instructor and Tutor for all levels of Math and Computer Science students, as well as Technical Support in Sojern and in Google Cloud. I am currently a Technical Account Manager at Qualtrics. I also volunteer as the Lead Web Developer and Site Admin for La Bestia Music Inc.

resume.skillmessage: Even though my current job does not involve much programming, I still love to do it!

education.description: Online program, did my Capstone on Cloud Computing technologies.
Introductory Certification on Deep Learning and its practical applications.
I also did a minor in Mathematics, worked as a Tutor, and volunteered in many student organizations.

work.title: Technical Account Manager
work.description: Own technical aspect of top-customer accounts to help them grow and develop their Experience Management projects to their fullest potential.

work.title: Technical Solutions Engineer - Google Cloud Platform
work.description: Technical Support for top-paying customers specializing in database and storage products such as Cloud Storage, Cloud Bigtable, Cloud Spanner, and Cloud Firestore, among others.

work.title: Technical Operations Specialist
work.description: Bilingual Technial Support for AdTech customers and development of automation tools to make everyone's lives easier.

work.title: Private Tutor
work.description: Mathematics, Spanish, and SAT preparation for 5th through 12th grade.

work.title: Instructor
work.description: Adventures in Scratch (5-8 y/o) and Intro to Programming with Javascript (10 - 12 y/o).

work.title: Tutor and Grader
work.description: Introductory to Intermediate undergraduate Computer Science and Mathematics courses.
